narrative.narrative: Ryukyu Air Communter is an airline based at Okinawa, Naha, Japan. It is 72.9% owned by Japan Transocean Air, which in turn JTA is owned 51% by Japan Airlines, making RAC a subsidiary of Japan Airlines too. They take their name from the chain of islands that Okinawa is in. They serve 10 destinations and have five planes, four Dash 8-100's and one Dash 8-300.
